snippet: Questions about Joint Base Lewis-McChord in Washington State have only increased since Sunday, when one of its soldiers was accused of killing at least 16 Afghan civilians, including 9 children, in an assassination-style ambush.
abstract: Questions about Joint Base Lewis-McChord in Washington State have only increased since Sunday, when one of its soldiers was accused of killing at least 16 Afghan civilians, including 9 children, in an assassination-style ambush.

headline.main: More Scrutiny of Lewis-McChord, Home Base of Accused Soldier
